title: Ratio Imaging Analyzer (RIA): A Standalone, Zero-Dependency Tool for Robust Ratiometric Fluorescence Analysis
description:
Ratio Imaging Analyzer (RIA) is a professional-grade, open-source desktop application engineered to democratize the analysis of ratiometric imaging data (e.g., GEM-GECO, Cameleon, FRET sensors). It addresses the technical barriers in neuroscience and cell biology by eliminating the need for complex programming environments (MATLAB/Python) or heavy image processing suites.

RIA bridges the critical gap between raw microscopy data and physiological insights, making advanced ratiometric analysis accessible to wet-lab biologists without coding expertise.
